name: Sheep Out
description:
Oh no! You got captured by the sheep nation.

Make your escape by stealing wool and other accessoires to disguise as a sheep and stay undetected!

You can find a horned helmet for your head, coconut halves for your feet and steal the wool off the sheep guards' backs.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Sprint: Shift
  • Interaction: Left Mouse Button

Credits:

  • Philip Hell - Programming
  • Sebastian Krause - 3D Character and Stuff
  • Tobias Thielen - Level Design, 3D Art
  • Julia Wolf - 2D Art
  • Music: Sneaky Snitch by Kevin MacLeod
